BBEX3.A.BGN.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Bulgaria / USD 1 = BGN ... (middle)
General: A currency conversion at the rate of BGL 1,000 = BGN 1 took place on 5 July 1999; the BGL remained legal tender at this rate until 31 December 1999.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of daily exchange rates.
